complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the initialization of the monorepo into subtasks covering: Yarn Workspaces setup, backend scaffolding (Express, TypeORM, PostgreSQL), frontend scaffolding (Vite, React), root-level script configuration, dependency management, code quality tooling (ESLint, Prettier, Husky), and verification/testing of the setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple frameworks and tools, cross-package coordination, and code quality automation. Each component (backend, frontend, tooling) requires distinct setup steps and integration, making the overall complexity above average but not extreme.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for user schema design, registration endpoint, login endpoint, password reset, JWT integration, Redis session management, SendGrid email integration, refresh token rotation, logout logic, and comprehensive integration testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task covers secure authentication, session management, email workflows, and integration with multiple external services. Security, correctness, and test coverage are critical, increasing both technical and organizational complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Design and Implement Project Creation and Management
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose into subtasks for project schema design, CRUD API endpoints, backend validation, frontend form implementation, React Query integration, progress tracking logic, Redis caching, and unit/integration testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires full-stack CRUD, state management, caching, and robust validation. It spans both backend and frontend, with data consistency and performance considerations.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Multi-Phase Wizard and Onboarding Flow

complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The task involves complex UI state, user experience flows, backend integration for tutorials, and persistent progress tracking, but is focused on a single user-facing feature set.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate AI-Driven Audience Research and Strategy Workflows
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for schema design (questionnaire/persona/competitor), OpenAI API integration, async job queue setup, endpoint implementation, report generation, PDF export, data persistence, versioning, frontend integration, and workflow testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task integrates advanced AI workflows, async processing, complex data structures, and report generation, requiring careful orchestration and error handling across multiple subsystems.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into subtasks for schema design (positioning, feedback, collaborators), AI endpoint implementation, feedback loop logic, invitation and comment endpoints, real-time notification setup, role/permission management, and testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose into subtasks for maintenance schema design, REST API endpoints, React dashboard UI, notification system integration, email alert setup, and end-to-end testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While full-stack, this task is focused on CRUD and notification features for a limited user group, making it less complex than core product features.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into subtasks for code-splitting/lazy loading, prerendering/static snapshot setup, SEO enhancements, accessibility improvements (ARIA, keyboard navigation), WCAG styling, Lighthouse/axe-core testing, and SEO validation.
